description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing game state in a multiplayer online Ludo game. It includes state variables, reset and update functions, and methods for game actions such as moving pieces, logging, and turn management.

methods.name: setRoom
methods.description: Sets the room ID and game mode.

methods.name: appendLog
methods.description: Adds a new message to the game log.

methods.name: nextTurn
methods.description: Advances the game to the next player's turn.

methods.name: movePiece
methods.description: Updates the position of a specific piece for a player by a number of steps.
